resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82235</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82235</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quiz on Theatrical Terms</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre términos relacionados con el teatro</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist ar Théarmaí Drámatúla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz auf Theatrical Bezeichnungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu aux conditions théâtrales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz em termos theatrical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz alle condizioni teatrali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων με θεατρικούς όρους</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students will test their level of knowledge. They will be introduced to many theatrical terms in the questions and answers.  The links provided encourage them to research unfamiliar terms.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes comprobarán su nivel de conocimientos. Se les presentarán algunos términos relacionados con el teatro con preguntas y respuestas. Los enlaces provistos les animan a investigar términos que no les resulten familiares.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh daltaí leibhéal a n-eolas. Cuirfear in aithne de théarmaí drámatúla iad sna ceisteanna agus freagraí. Spreagann na naisc a thugtar iad taighde a dhéanamh ar théarmaí nua.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Drama</string>
            <string language="es">Teatro</string>
            <string language="ga">Dráma</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer prüfen ihre Stufe des 
Wissens. Sie werden zu vielen theatrical Bezeichnungen in den 
Fragen und in den Antworten eingeführt. Die bereitgestellten 
Links regen sie an, nicht vertraute Bezeichnungen zu erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants testeront leur niveau de la 
connaissance. Ils seront présentés à beaucoup de limites 
théâtrales en questions et réponses. Les liens fournis les 
encouragent à rechercher des limites peu familières.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes testarão seu nível do 
conhecimento. Serão introduzidos a muitos termos theatrical nas
perguntas e nas respostas. As ligações fornecidas 
incentivam-nos pesquisar termos estranhos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi verificheranno il loro livello di 
conoscenza. Saranno introdotti a molti termini teatrali in 
domande ed in risposte. I collegamenti forniti consigliano loro 
ricercare i termini non pratici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν το επίπεδο γνώσης τους. 
Θα εισαχθούν σε πολλούς θεατρικούς όρους στις 
ερωταποκρίσεις. Οι συνδέσεις παρεχόμενες τους ενθαρρύνουν 
για να ερευνήσουν τους άγνωστους όρους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dramma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δράμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1988</entry>
          </identifier>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>

        <educational>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
